comments.author: Noble.2670
comments.body: Hey guys, I was told to bring my suggestion here, so here I am, I was wondering if there’s a chance there will ever be a forum app, or if someone could make one, I know a number of people who only go onto the forums on there phone when there out, wether it’s to kill time, or just get that gw2 fix!, here’s where the issue Lyes, the forums on a phone are terrible, it’s awkward to post scrolling across every few words, or reply to people’s posts without zooming in etc etc, an app could fix all these issues, and had some handy extras, like push notifications when someone sends you a message or posts on your topic etc etc, I also think this would encourage people to use the forums more, meaning overall more activity here, due to the fact the forums are off putting on phones, so, any chance there ever be one, is anyone capable of making such a app? If so if be happy to fund it, and what dose the community overall think of this idea? Leave some feedback!
